Html:
Hey all...at the recent PNP Summit in Seattle there was some discussion between Rocky and the pnp team for Prism 2.

It was suggested that a thread get started regarding these two things playing nicely in a demo sandbox.  Anyone done this yet?  I noticed this thread which didn't get any followup http://www.codeplex.com/CompositeWPF/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=39201

There are a lot of us out here that are excited about both of these technologies!

Sean
